ComicInfo.Series: Madballs vs Garbage Pail Kids: Time Again, Slime Again
ComicInfo.Summary: The Garbage Pail Kids and Madballs ride the range as cowpokes (hey, someone's got to poke those cows). But their competition to see who can make their ghost town more ghastly soon means this town ain't big enough for the both of them! Plus: In the world of 1950s drag-racing greasers, there's nobody greasier than the Madballs and the Garbage Pail Kids! When they go head-to-disembodied head in a drag race of souped-up hot rods (powered by the high-octane of week-old cabbage soup), it's winner take all!
